tweet_text:
The loving, conscious thing to do is:

Remove yourself from the situation & communicate when you'll check back in ("I'm going to go for a walk, I'll be back in an hour...")

If an hour wasn't enough, keep re-upping the time.

Get support (through a therapist or a coach)
text_en: The loving, conscious thing to do is: Remove yourself from the situation & communicate when you'll check back in ("I'm going to go for a walk, I'll be back in an hour...") If an hour wasn't enough, keep re-upping the time. Get support (through a therapist or a coach)
reply_text: The loving, conscious thing to do is: Remove yourself from the situation & communicate when you'll check back in ("I'm going to go for a walk, I'll be back in an hour...") If an hour wasn't enough, keep re-upping the time. Get support (through a therapist or a coach)
